friends.no.friend.title: You have no friends yet
friends.no.friend.description: You can access to your contacts from your favorite social application. Connect to it in order to show all your contacts into this screen to be able to match with somebody!
friends.list.love.toast.content: When {{name}} will click on you, you will match! Nobody knows that you're in love
friends.list.hide.toast.content: {{name}} will be hide from your main list
friends.list.show.toast.content: {{name}} will be present on your main list
friends.filter.name.label: Search by name
friends.filter.love.label: Love
friends.filter.not.love.label: Not love
friends.filter.hide.label: Hidden friends
friends.filter.not.hide.label: Not hidden friends
